noDataDescription: Your recent searches will appear here. Perform a search and select images to build up your history.

homepage.title: GetImages
homepage.subtitle: Search for images using multiple keywords and create your curated list.

demoNotice.title: Demo Notice:
demoNotice.body: This application uses the free tier of <serpapiLink>SerpAPI</serpapiLink>, which has usage limitations.
demoNotice.action: If you encounter issues or want unlimited access, <openSettingsButton>open Settings</openSettingsButton> and add your own API key.

homepage.imagePreviewDescription: Click to select images (first available one selected automatically)
homepage.feedbackText: Feel free to <issueLink>open an issue</issueLink> if you have any questions or suggestions.
